post.description:
Add some user with `user_id` indentifier, send in the body.

The requester should be a group admin.

The `role` body parameter is a new user role. Only one role could be used to add to the user. If user already in the group with different role, the new role will be attached to the user.

Remove user roles from group.

The requester shold be a group admin or tenant admin.

if all the roles detached from the user - the user will be removed from the group.

If it was the only group user was in tenant - the user will be removed from tenant as well.

This API endpoint allows you to create a new group for a specific tenant. The HTTP POST request should be sent to `{{server}}/user/tenant/{{new_tenant}}/group/{{new_group}}/change`.

### Request Parameters

- `new_tenant` (path parameter): The unique identifier of the tenant for which the group is being created.
- `new_group` (path parameter): The unique identifier of the new group being created.
    

`roles` body parameter is a string array with the new roles set for the user.

If user has some roles, which are not present in this parameter - they will be deleted.

If user has not roles, which present in this parameter, roles will be attached.

If roles array amty - all current roles will be removed. The user will be removed from the group.

### Response

The response will be a JSON object with a `status` property indicating the status of the request.

### Example

Request:

```
POST {{server}}/user/tenant/abc123/group/xyz789/cange

 ```

Response:

``` json
{
  "status": ""
}

 ```

Please note that the actual response may vary depending on the server's implementation.

delete.description:
Delete user from group. If the user has no membership in other groups of the tenant - he will be removed from the tenant as well.

The requester should be group admin.

get.description:
This request returns user's membership: all tenants, groups and roles in those groups.

The result is an object, tenant id is a key and tenant bebmership object is a value wiht following fields:

- `tenant_id`
    
- `tenant_name`
    
- `groups`
    
- `group_names`
    

`groups` is a map of group id as key and array of `role_id` as a value. All user's roles inside the group.

`group_names` is a map - group id to group name pamming for display in UI.

The names for roles you can grab from tenant info request, as each tenant could have it's own set of roles.

error.message: You have not permission to process the operation.
You have not permission to process the operation.

delete.description: Remove user from tenant, only tenant admin could initiate the action.

error.message: You are not able to invite anyone to the tenant and group you requested.
